tech_news.title: PlayStation Plus Free Games For December 2025 Revealed - GameSpot

tech_news.title: You can play classic Nintendo games on these custom SNES-inspired Nike sneakers - The Verge
tech_news.description: Gustavo Bonzanini created a custom pair of Nike Air Max 90 sneakers inspired by the Super Nintendo that double as a functional console.

tech_news.description: iOS 26.2 is packed with a bunch of new features, including upgrades across six of Apple’s preinstalled iPhone apps.

tech_news.title: Mounts of Mayhem official release date - Minecraft
tech_news.description: Riders of the Overworld, arise! Mounts of Mayhem is coming to Minecraft on December 9, bringing with it new mounted foes, a new tiered weapon – and plenty of challenges. Charge into the fray on December 9 in both Java and Bedrock Edition!
